A WordPress plugin that allows you to effortlessly install and manage aesy-to-use
enhancements (aka "perks") for Gravity Forms.

    Buying Gravity Perks grants you access to all perks.That's 23 perks and couting!

  • Forward Cpmpatibility
    If a perks's funtionality is ever roled into Gravity Forms's core the perk will be updated to automatically convert your existing.
  • Seamless Integration
    Don't waste time learning a new system, Gravity Perks seamlessly integrate.
  • Install and Manage in the Admin
    Install and manage your perks right from the WordPress admin.

Explore Available our Perks !

Yes, explore our products all of these features are included in your business !
  • Convert abandoning visitors into subscribers and customers
    Did you know that over 70% of visitors who abandon your website will never return?
    Our Exit Intent technoogy detects user behavior and prompts them with a targeted campaign at the precise moment they are about to leave.
  • Easily A/B test your ideas and increase conversions
    A/B testing helps you eliminate the guess work and make data-driven decisions on what works best.
    Try different content, headlines, layouts, and styles to see what converts best with our smart and easy to use A/B testing tool.
  • Measuring your results has never been easier
    Get the stats that matter and take action to improve your lead generation strategy.
    With our built-in analytics, you can quickly find out how your optin forms are perfoming. Analyze clicks, views, and overall conversion rate for each page or optin style.
